productSchema.description: Specifies the usage message for queue bandwidth.
productSchema.attribute: Specifies the amount of inbound public bandwidth, in bytes. The maximum value is 6TB.
Specifies the amount of inbound bandwidth on Service Net, in bytes. The maximum value is 6TB.
Specifies teh amount of public outbound bandwidth, in bytes. The maximum value is 6TB.
Specifies the amount of outbound bandwidth on Service Net, in bytes. The maximum value is 6TB.
